title: Agricultural resilience: Impact of extreme weather events on the adoption of rural insurance in Brazil
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 89

Author(s): Elizângela Aparecida dos Santos, Elena Beatriz Piedra-Bonilla, Gabriela Madureira Barroso, Jordão Vieira Silva, Seyede Parvin Hejazirad, José Barbosa dos Santos
